data.text: Hoohoo gi di madagoaa deenei, King Hezekiah guu magi hoohoo hua bolo gaa made. Soukohp Isaiah, tama daane Amoz, guu hana belee mmada a mee, ga helekai gi mee, “Dimaadua e helekai adu bolo goe gi hagatogomaalia ina nia mee huogodoo, idimaa, doo magi la hagalee hili. Hagatogomaalia ina goe gaa made.”
Hezekiah ga huli adu gi di abaaba ga dalodalo,
“Dimaadua, Goe e langahia bolo au nogo hai hegau adu gi di Goe i di manawa dahi mo di tonu, ge hagamahi i nia madagoaa huogodoo e hagagila aga do manawa.” Gei mee ga daamada ga dangidangihia.
Dimaadua ga helekai gi Isaiah

gii hana gi muli gi Hezekiah, gi helekai gi mee, “Ko Au go Yihowah, di God o do damana madua David, Au gu longono au dalodalo gu gidee oo dangi. Au ga dumaalia adu nia ngadau e madangaholu maa lima gi mada waalooloo do mouli.
Au gaa daa goe mo di waahale deenei gi daha mo di king aamua o Assyria, ga benebene hagahumalia gi muli di waahale.”
Isaiah ga helekai, “Dimaadua ga gowadu gi di goe di hagamodongoohia e hagadootonu bolo Mee ga daahi dana hagababa.
I hongo di gaagenge dela ne hai go King Ahaz, Dimaadua gaa hai di malu gii hana gi muli nia habodo e madangaholu.” Gei e donu, di malu gu menege gi muli nia habodo e madangaholu.
I muli hua Hezekiah ne hili dono magi, mee gaa hihi dana daahili hagaamu deenei:
Au gu hagamaanadu bolo i di madagoaa maaloo o dogu mouli,
Au e hagamaanadu bolo i lodo tenua o digau mouli,
Dogu mouli guu tuu gi daha gu hagalawa,
I di boo hagatau gei au gu dangidangi mo ogu mmae,
Dogu lee gu maeha gei gu bagege,
Gei au belee helekai bolo aha?
Meenei Tagi, au ga mouli adu gi di Goe hua modo Gooe.
Dogu manawa gee gaa huli gaa hai di aumaalia.
Tangada i lodo tenua o digau mmade e mee di hagaamu Goe ai.
Ma go digau mouli ala e hagaamu Goe,
Dimaadua, Goe gu hagahili au.
Isaiah ne hagi anga gi di king gi dugua di walee ne hai gi nia huwa ‘fig’ gi hongo dono magi buu, geia gaa hili.
King Hezekiah ga heeu, “Di hagamodongoohia aha e hagadootonu bolo au gaa mee di hana gi di Hale Daumaha Dimaadua?”
